name: Hero Girls Fashion DressUp - Super Power Girls Game
name_original: Hero Girls Fashion DressUp - Super Power Girls Game
description:
Are you ready to save the world? Come help this superhero girl prepare for her missions! But wait! First mission is to help design her new super hero costume! Sometimes even princesses have cool secrets. This princess has to be really careful so no one figures out what she's hiding: she's a superhero! Having a double identity is hard for a princess because everyone is always watching her!

The world has a new hero: Super Power Girls.
But before you begin to combat crime it is necessary that you choose uniform.

Product features:
- Princess is actually a superhero girl who fight crimes.
- Makeup for her as a superhero girl
- Don't forget to do her hair & make sure its superhero friendly
- Choose a best friend to help you out on your missions
- Dress up in superhero girl costumes.
- There are lots of superhero outfits to choose from!

How to Play:
- Use easy interactive controls to play the game.
- Hide her double identity by picking out the right mask and outfit!
- Give her a princess makeover so no one suspects a thing!
- Use salon tools to do her makeup and change her clothes.
